name: Notion Habit Tracker Pro
description: This is the Habit Tracker Notion Template. It is a simple yet effective template which helps you track your habits everyday. Everyday it automatically detects a new day and you can start with a blank checkbox data sheet which means you don't have to erase everything everyday.Features include:1. Button feature2. Automatic Daily Habits3. Weekly view4. Monthly view 5. Calendar View6. Percentage showing for completion rate 7. Grap representationHow To Get Access:Click I want thisyou will be directed
features: Click I want this; you will be directed to the template; on the top right corner you will see a "Duplicate" button; Just Click it and it will be duplicated to your Notion Databases
